From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: dezember and dezëmber

Ewe

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from German Dezember.

Proper noun

[edit]

Dezember

  1. December
    Coordinate term: (native term) Dzome

See also

[edit]
Gregorian calendar months: ɣletiwoedit
  • Dzove, Yanuar
  • Dzodze, Februar
  • Tedoxe, Mars
  • Afɔfiɛ, April
  • Damɛ, Mai
  • Masa, Yuni
  • Siamlɔm, Yuli
  • Dasiamime, August
  • Anyɔnyɔ, September
  • Kele, Ɔktober
  • Adeɛmekpɔxe, Nɔvember
  • Dzome, Dezember

German

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • December (obsolete)
  • Dec., Xber (abbreviation, obsolete)
  • Dez. (abbreviation)

Etymology

[edit]

    Inherited from Middle High German december.

    Pronunciation

    [edit]
    • IPA(key): /deˈtsɛmbɐ/
    • Audio:(file)
    • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)
    • Hyphenation: De‧zem‧ber

    Noun

    [edit]

    Dezember m (strong, genitive Dezembers or Dezember, plural Dezember)

    1. December

    Declension

    [edit]
    Declension of Dezember [masculine, strong]
    singular plural
    indef. def. noun def. noun
    nominative ein der Dezember die Dezember
    genitive eines des Dezembers, Dezember der Dezember
    dative einem dem Dezember den Dezembern
    accusative einen den Dezember die Dezember

    Coordinate terms

    [edit]
    Gregorian calendar months: Monate im gregorianischen Kalenderedit
    • Januar, (Austria, South Tyrol) Jänner
    • Februar, (Austria, dated) Feber
    • März
    • April
    • Mai
    • Juni, Juno
    • Juli, Julei
    • August
    • September
    • Oktober
    • November
    • Dezember

    Descendants

    [edit]
    • → Estonian: detsember
    • → Hunsrik: Dezember
    • → Kashubian: december
    • → Hebrew: דצמבר (detsémber)
    • → Luxembourgish: Dezember

    Further reading

    [edit]
    • “Dezember” in Duden online
    • “Dezember” in Digitales Wörterbuch der deutschen Sprache

    Hunsrik

    [edit]

    Etymology

    [edit]

      Borrowed from German Dezember.[1]

      Pronunciation

      [edit]
      • IPA(key): /ˈteːˌt͡sɛmpa/
      • Rhymes: -ɛmpa

      Noun

      [edit]

      Dezember m (plural Dezember)

      1. December

      See also

      [edit]
      Gregorian calendar months: Monate im gregorianicher Kalenneredit
      • Januer
      • Februer
      • Merz
      • April
      • Maai
      • Juni
      • Juli
      • August ~ Aagust
      • September
      • Oktover
      • November
      • Dezember

      References

      [edit]
      1. ^ Boll, Piter Kehoma (2021), “Dezember”, in Dicionário Hunsriqueano Riograndense–Português, 3rd edition (overall work in Portuguese), Ivoti: Riograndenser Hunsrickisch, page 34, column 1

      Luxembourgish

      [edit]

      Etymology

      [edit]

      Borrowed from German Dezember.

      Pronunciation

      [edit]
      • IPA(key): /deˈtsæmbeʀ/, [dəˈt͡sæmbɐ]

      Noun

      [edit]

      Dezember m (plural Dezember)

      1. December

      See also

      [edit]
      Gregorian calendar months: Méint am Gregorianesche Kalenneredit
      • Januar
      • Februar
      • Mäerz
      • Abrëll
      • Mee
      • Juni
      • Juli
      • August
      • September
      • Oktober
      • November
      • Dezember

      Pennsylvania German

      [edit]

      Etymology

      [edit]

      Compare German Dezember.

      Noun

      [edit]

      Dezember m

      1. December (month)
        Synonym: Grischtmunet

      See also

      [edit]
      Gregorian calendar monthsedit
      • Yanuaar, Yenner
      • Febrewaar, Hanning
      • Matz
      • Aprill
      • Moi
      • Yuni
      • Yuli, Tschulei
      • Aaguscht
      • Sepdember
      • Oktower
      • Nowember
      • Dezember, Grischtmunet

      Scots

      [edit]

      Alternative forms

      [edit]
      • December

      Etymology

      [edit]

      From Latin december (“of the tenth month”).

      Pronunciation

      [edit]
      • IPA(key): [dɪˈzɛmbər], [dɛˈzɛmbər]

      Proper noun

      [edit]

      Dezember

      1. December

      See also

      [edit]
      • (month): Previous: November. Next: Januar
